Aug. 17, 1907 D Silkstone Contest
Silkstone Contest 0 March & Own Choice Test Piece Contest
silkstone-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Daughter of the Regiment [unknown arranger]
Noblethorpe Park, Silkstone 1st prize £8, 2nd prize £4, 3rd prize £2, 4th prize £1. March contest 1st Cleckheaton Victoria, 2nd Scapegoat Hill. 6 bands competed.
April 5, 2012, 3:08 p.m. Sept. 19, 2018, 9:37 p.m.
1 Hinchliffe Mill Band Angus Holden
2 Scapegoat Hill Angus Holden
3 Cleckheaton Victoria Angus Holden
4 Denby Dale Brass Fenton Renshaw
Unknown Result Dodworth Colliery MW Brass James Moorhouse
